featured_partners_subtitle: Shop with the brands that reward your loyalty. Earn cashback on every purchase.
delete_partner_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this partner?
redirect_success: Redirecting to store. Your cashback will be tracked automatically!
redirect_fallback: Redirecting to store. Cashback tracking may not work.
redirect_error: Could not open store. Please try again.
access_will_be_registered: By clicking "Go to store", your access will be registered to generate cashback in case of purchase.
select_fan_token_label: Select the Fan Token to receive your cashback:
important_conversion_notice: Important: The Fan Token conversion value will be calculated on the day of cashback payment confirmation, using the current exchange rate.
no_stores_found: No stores found with the applied filters.
